languages.text: Слухи о природном псифокусе, поступающем в десятину из отсталого мира, распространились по Простору Коронус, как пожар на нижних палубах. Торговые компании, консорциумы шахтеров и вольнонаемные копатели жадно взялись за добычу, и тассерций широкой рекой хлынул в другие системы. Тлетворное влияние минерала сказалось спустя поколения: отвратительные мутации и порочные культы цвели там, где скапливался тассерций, к удовлетворению Губительных сил, что наблюдали за своей паствой из безупречной синевы камня.

Rumours of a natural psy-focus supplied as tithe by a backward world spread across the Koronus Expanse like a fire on the lower decks. Fuelled by the greed of trading companies, mining consortia, and freelance diggers, thassertium extraction increased, and the mineral soon flooded other systems. Thassertium's pernicious influence did not make itself known until generations later, when various places that stockpiled it became hotbeds of repulsive mutations and corrupt cults, much to the satisfaction of the Ruinous Powers quietly watching their new flocks from behind the immaculate blue of the rock.
languages.original_text: Слухи о природном псифокусе, поступающем в десятину из отсталого мира, распространились по Простору Коронус, как пожар на нижних палубах. Торговые компании, консорциумы шахтеров и вольнонаемные копатели жадно взялись за добычу, и тассерций широкой рекой хлынул в другие системы. languages.text: Gerüchte über einen natürlichen Psi-Fokus, der von einer rückständigen Welt als Zehnt geliefert wurde, breiteten sich in der Koronus-Ausdehnung aus wie ein Feuer auf den unteren Decks. Durch die Gier von Handelsunternehmen, Bergbaukonsortien und selbstständigen Bergleuten erhöhte sich der Thassertium-Abbau, und schon bald überflutete das Mineral andere Systeme. Der schädliche Einfluss von Thassertium trat jedoch erst Generationen später zutage, als verschiedene Orte, die es lagerten, zu Brutstätten abstoßender Mutationen und verderbter Kulte wurden, sehr zur Zufriedenheit der Mächte der Zerstörung, die still ihre neuen Herden von hinter dem tadellosen Blau des Steins aus beobachteten.
languages.original_text: Rumours of a natural psy-focus supplied as tithe by a backward world spread across the Koronus Expanse like a fire on the lower decks. Fuelled by the greed of trading companies, mining consortia, and freelance diggers, thassertium extraction increased, and the mineral soon flooded other systems. Thassertium's pernicious influence did not make itself known until generations later, when various places that stockpiled it became hotbeds of repulsive mutations and corrupt cults, much to the satisfaction of the Ruinous Powers quietly watching their new flocks from behind the immaculate blue of the rock.

traits.locale_text: Gerüchte über einen natürlichen Psi-Fokus, der von einer rückständigen Welt als Zehnt geliefert wurde, breiteten sich in der Koronus-Ausdehnung aus wie ein Feuer auf den unteren Decks. Durch die Gier von Handelsunternehmen, Bergbaukonsortien und selbstständigen Bergleuten erhöhte sich der Thassertium-Abbau, und schon bald überflutete das Mineral andere Systeme. Der schädliche Einfluss von Thassertium trat jedoch erst Generationen später zutage, als verschiedene Orte, die es lagerten, zu Brutstätten abstoßender Mutationen und verderbter Kulte wurden, sehr zur Zufriedenheit der Mächte der Zerstörung, die still ihre neuen Herden von hinter dem tadellosen Blau des Steins aus beobachteten.

languages.text: Les rumeurs faisant état de dîme payée en focalisateurs psychiques par un monde arriéré se répandirent comme une traînée de poudre dans les Étendues de Koronus. L'extraction du thassertium s'intensifia, alimentée par l'avidité des sociétés commerciales, des consortiums miniers et des foreurs indépendants, et le minerai inonda bientôt les marchés d'autres systèmes. Ce n'est que bien des générations plus tard que l'influence pernicieuse du thassertium fut révélée, lorsqu'il s'avéra que bien des mondes où il était stocké étaient devenus de véritables foyers de mutations et de cultes corrompus, à la grande satisfaction des Puissances de la Ruine qui observaient en silence leurs nouvelles ouailles derrière le bleu immaculé de la roche.
languages.original_text: Rumours of a natural psy-focus supplied as tithe by a backward world spread across the Koronus Expanse like a fire on the lower decks. Fuelled by the greed of trading companies, mining consortia, and freelance diggers, thassertium extraction increased, and the mineral soon flooded other systems. Thassertium's pernicious influence did not make itself known until generations later, when various places that stockpiled it became hotbeds of repulsive mutations and corrupt cults, much to the satisfaction of the Ruinous Powers quietly watching their new flocks from behind the immaculate blue of the rock.

traits.locale_text: Les rumeurs faisant état de dîme payée en focalisateurs psychiques par un monde arriéré se répandirent comme une traînée de poudre dans les Étendues de Koronus. L'extraction du thassertium s'intensifia, alimentée par l'avidité des sociétés commerciales, des consortiums miniers et des foreurs indépendants, et le minerai inonda bientôt les marchés d'autres systèmes. Ce n'est que bien des générations plus tard que l'influence pernicieuse du thassertium fut révélée, lorsqu'il s'avéra que bien des mondes où il était stocké étaient devenus de véritables foyers de mutations et de cultes corrompus, à la grande satisfaction des Puissances de la Ruine qui observaient en silence leurs nouvelles ouailles derrière le bleu immaculé de la roche.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区爆发了传言，所有人都在谈论来自某个落后世界的天然灵能媒介。这些传言就像底层甲板的大火一样，很快便席卷了整个扩区。在贪婪的贸易公司、矿业联盟，以及自由矿工的推动下，塔瑟拉水晶的开采量不断提高，很快就流通到了其他星系。当人们终于意识到塔瑟拉水晶的危害时，已经是好几代人之后的事情了。那些囤积塔瑟拉水晶的世界，最终沦为了变异与腐化的温床，邪教不断滋长壮大。毁灭之力隐藏在纯净的蓝水晶中，静静地看着新的牧群，对这样的结果非常满意。
languages.original_text: Rumours of a natural psy-focus supplied as tithe by a backward world spread across the Koronus Expanse like a fire on the lower decks. Fuelled by the greed of trading companies, mining consortia, and freelance diggers, thassertium extraction increased, and the mineral soon flooded other systems. Thassertium's pernicious influence did not make itself known until generations later, when various places that stockpiled it became hotbeds of repulsive mutations and corrupt cults, much to the satisfaction of the Ruinous Powers quietly watching their new flocks from behind the immaculate blue of the rock.

languages.text: Los rumores de un foco psíquico natural enviado como diezmo desde un mundo primitivo se extendieron por la Extensión de Koronus como un incendio por las cubiertas inferiores. Impulsada por la codicia de las compañías comerciales, los consorcios mineros y los excavadores independientes, la extracción de thassertio aumentó y el mineral no tardó en extenderse por otros sistemas. La influencia nociva del thassertio no se dio a conocer hasta generaciones más tarde, cuando diversos lugares que lo almacenaban se convirtieron en hervideros de horrendas mutaciones y cultos corruptos, para satisfacción de los Poderes Ruinosos que observaban en silencio a sus nuevos seguidores tras el azul inmaculado de la roca.
languages.original_text: Rumours of a natural psy-focus supplied as tithe by a backward world spread across the Koronus Expanse like a fire on the lower decks. Fuelled by the greed of trading companies, mining consortia, and freelance diggers, thassertium extraction increased, and the mineral soon flooded other systems. Thassertium's pernicious influence did not make itself known until generations later, when various places that stockpiled it became hotbeds of repulsive mutations and corrupt cults, much to the satisfaction of the Ruinous Powers quietly watching their new flocks from behind the immaculate blue of the rock.

Impulsada por la codicia de las compañías comerciales, los consorcios mineros y los excavadores independientes, la extracción de thassertio aumentó y el mineral no tardó en extenderse por otros sistemas. La influencia nociva del thassertio no se dio a conocer hasta generaciones más tarde, cuando diversos lugares que lo almacenaban se convirtieron en hervideros de horrendas mutaciones y cultos corruptos, para satisfacción de los Poderes Ruinosos que observaban en silencio a sus nuevos seguidores tras el azul inmaculado de la roca.

languages.text: 後進惑星が租税として供給する天然の超能力集中物質の噂が、コロヌス・エクスパンスで下層デッキの火のように広まった。交易会社、鉱業組合、そしてフリーランスの採掘者たちの強欲に煽られ、タッセリウムの採掘は増加し、その鉱物はやがて他の星系にも溢れ出した。タッセリウムの有害な影響は何世代も後になって初めて明らかとなり、それを蓄積した様々な場所が、忌まわしい変異や堕落したカルトの温床となった。美しく澄んだ青色の岩の背後から静かに新しい群れを見守る〈禍つ神々〉にとっては、まさに喜ばしい状況だった。
languages.original_text: Rumours of a natural psy-focus supplied as tithe by a backward world spread across the Koronus Expanse like a fire on the lower decks. Fuelled by the greed of trading companies, mining consortia, and freelance diggers, thassertium extraction increased, and the mineral soon flooded other systems. Thassertium's pernicious influence did not make itself known until generations later, when various places that stockpiled it became hotbeds of repulsive mutations and corrupt cults, much to the satisfaction of the Ruinous Powers quietly watching their new flocks from behind the immaculate blue of the rock.

languages.text: Geri kalmış bir dünyaca aşar olarak tedarik edilen doğal bir ruhsezi odağı olduğu söylentileri, alt güvertelerden parlayan bir yangın misali Koronus Enginliği'ne yayıldı. Ticaret şirketlerinin, maden konsorsiyumlarının ve serbest çalışan madencilerin açgözlülüğüyle körüklenen tasertiyum çıkarma faaliyetleri büyük bir hız kazandı ve bu maden, kısa sürede diğer sistemleri de sarıp sarmaladı. Tasertiyumu stoklayan çeşitli yerlerin, tiksindirici mutasyonların ve yozlaşmış tarikatların kuluçka merkezi hâline gelmesiyle bu madenin ölümcül etkisi ancak nesiller sonra kendini gösterdi. Bu durum, yeni müritlerini taşın lekesiz maviliğinin ardından sessizce izleyen Yıkıcı Güçler'in de fazlasıyla işine geldi.
languages.original_text: Rumours of a natural psy-focus supplied as tithe by a backward world spread across the Koronus Expanse like a fire on the lower decks. Fuelled by the greed of trading companies, mining consortia, and freelance diggers, thassertium extraction increased, and the mineral soon flooded other systems. Thassertium's pernicious influence did not make itself known until generations later, when various places that stockpiled it became hotbeds of repulsive mutations and corrupt cults, much to the satisfaction of the Ruinous Powers quietly watching their new flocks from behind the immaculate blue of the rock.

traits.locale_text: Geri kalmış bir dünya tarafından aşar olarak tedarik edilen doğal bir ruhsezi odağı olduğu söylentileri, alt güvertelerden parlayan bir yangın misali Koronus Enginliği'ne yayıldı. Ticaret şirketlerinin, maden konsorsiyumlarının ve serbest çalışan madencilerin açgözlülüğüyle körüklenen tasertiyum çıkarma faaliyetleri büyük bir hız kazandı ve bu mineral, kısa sürede diğer sistemleri de sarıp sarmaladı. Tasertiyumu stoklayan çeşitli yerlerin, tiksindirici mutasyonların ve yozlaşmış tarikatların kuluçka merkezi hâline gelmesiyle bu mineralin ölümcül etkisi ancak nesiller sonra kendini gösterdi. Bu durum, yeni müritlerini taşın lekesiz maviliğinin ardından sessizce izleyen Yıkıcı Güçler'in de fazlasıyla işine geldi.
